channel.title: Comments on: What’s happening in Rome..

item.title: By: What’s happening in Rome? 2014 Open Hardw...
item.dc:creator: What’s happening in Rome? 2014 Open Hardw...
item.description: […] The 2014 Open Hardware Summit is, for the first time ever, a two day event featuring speakers, keynotes, and workshops centred on the topic of the Open Source movement! This is the fifth year of the Summit and the first time it will be held outside the USA. What does that mean for attendees?You have the chance to come to Rome and attend multiple awesome events in the span of a few days, from 28 September to 5 October for lnnovation Week!  […]
item.content:encoded: […] The 2014 Open Hardware Summit is, for the first time ever, a two day event featuring speakers, keynotes, and workshops centred on the topic of the Open Source movement! This is the fifth year of the Summit and the first time it will be held outside the USA. What does that mean for attendees?You have the chance to come to Rome and attend multiple awesome events in the span of a few days, from 28 September to 5 October for lnnovation Week!  […]
